meanings.definition: The state of being present in a particular place or situation.
meanings.sent1: Her presentness at the party made everyone happy.
meanings.sent2: The presentness of the teacher in the classroom was reassuring.
meanings.sent3: His presentness at the meeting was unexpected but delightful.
meanings.sent4: The presentness of the sun in the sky brought warmth to the day.
meanings.sent5: The presentness of the flowers in the garden added beauty to the surroundings.

meanings.definition: The quality of being current or up-to-date.
meanings.sent1: The presentness of the information was crucial for the project.
meanings.sent2: I always strive to maintain the presentness of my knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The presentness of his fashion sense was admired by all.
meanings.sent4: Her presentness in technology trends was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The presentness of the news kept everyone informed and engaged.

meanings.definition: The act of giving or showing something to someone.
meanings.sent1: His presentness of the gift brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent2: The presentness of the award ceremony was a grand affair.
meanings.sent3: The presentness of his gesture touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent4: Her presentness of kindness made a lasting impact.
meanings.sent5: The presentness of the donation was greatly appreciated by the charity.
